@-moz-document url-prefix("https://soundcloud.com/stream"){.playControls__bg,.playControls__inner{background-color:transparent;border:none;}.playControls__inner{height:0;}.l-container.l-content{padding-top:0;}.playControls{position:fixed;top:0;visibility:hidden;width:100%;-webkit-perspective:900;perspective:900px;-webkit-perspective-origin:80% 100%;perspective-origin:80% 100%;background:#222;}.playControls__elements{position:fixed;margin-top:32px;left:0;width:232px;}.playControls__volume{position:fixed;top:255px;right:0;margin:0;z-index:2;}.volume__button{display:block;}.volume__sliderWrapper{position:absolute;left:-1px;bottom:50px;width:45px;z-index:1;transition:none;transform:none;overflow:visible;background-color:transparent;border:none;cursor:pointer;}.volume__sliderWrapper,.volume__sliderBackground,.volume__sliderProgress{opacity:1;transition:none;transform:none;height:210px;margin:0;}.volume__sliderBackground{position:absolute;display:block;background-color:transparent;bottom:0;left:0;width:45px;box-shadow:none;border-radius:0;}.volume__sliderWrapper:hover .volume__sliderBackground{border-top:1px solid #5EEBDA;border-bottom:1px solid #5EEBDA;}.volume__sliderWrapper:hover .volume__sliderProgress{background:#5EEBDA;}.volume__sliderProgress{background:#EDC63C;bottom:0;width:1px;position:absolute;margin-left:10px;}.volume__sliderHandle{position:absolute;display:none;width:100%;height:10px;border-radius:0;background-color:#f50;margin-left:0;transition:none;transform:none;}.playControls__soundBadge{position:fixed;width:285px;height:40px;padding:0;top:15px;left:35px;z-index:1;}.playbackSoundBadge__avatar{position:absolute;top:0;margin:0;animation:pulse 1.5s 1s 3.8;z-index:1;}@keyframes pulse{0%{transform:scale(0.9);opacity:.4;}30%{transform:scale(1);opacity:1;}80%{transform:scale(1);opacity:1;}100%{transform:scale(0.9);opacity:.4;}}.playbackSoundBadge__avatar:before{content:'';position:absolute;height:36px;width:36px;left:-1px;top:-1px;z-index:-1;background-color:#ff6d65;}.playbackSoundBadge__avatar .sc-artwork{height:34px!important;width:34px!important;}.playbackSoundBadge__titleContextContainer{position:absolute;width:86%;top:0;right:0;height:38px;overflow:hidden;}.playbackSoundBadge__lightLink{text-align:left;font-size:12px;color:#EDC63C!important;text-transform:uppercase;margin-left:12%;width:88%;border-right:solid 25px #E4D293;animation:animated-text .3s linear 1 normal both,animated-cursor 300ms linear infinite;}@keyframes animated-text{0%{width:0;opacity:1;}80%{width:100%;opacity:1;}90%{opacity:0;}100%{opacity:1;}}@keyframes animated-cursor{from{border-right-color:#E4D293;}to{border-right-color:transparent;}}.playbackSoundBadge__titleLink{font-size:18px;text-transform:uppercase;color:#83FFFE;width:100%;position:absolute;bottom:0;left:0;animation:flyin .5s linear;}@keyframes flyin{0%{transform:translateY(-100%);opacity:0;}60%{transform:translateY(0%);opacity:1;}90%{opacity:0;}100%{opacity:1;}}.playbackSoundBadge__actions{position:absolute;top:0;left:-30px;width:33%;height:100%;margin:0;}.playbackSoundBadge__like{border:1px solid #ff6d65!important;}.playbackSoundBadge__showQueue{position:absolute;bottom:0;left:0;}.playbackSoundBadge__follow{position:absolute;top:0;right:0;border:1px solid #EDC63C!important;}.playbackSoundBadge__actions .sc-button-follow.sc-button-selected{background-color:#EDC63C;}.playbackSoundBadge__queueIcon,.playbackSoundBadge__queueCircle,.playbackSoundBadge__follow,.playbackSoundBadge__like,.playbackSoundBadge__showQueue{width:20px!important;height:20px!important;padding:0!important;border-radius:0;margin:0!important;}.playControls__timeline{position:fixed;margin:0;left:35px;width:265px;top:60px;z-index:3;}.playControls__timeline:after{content:'IIIIIIIII';position:absolute;left:9.5%;top:-2px;text-align:left;font-size:1px;color:#fff;letter-spacing:25.2px;z-index:-1;}.playbackTimeline{font-size:11px;}.playbackTimeline__progressWrapper{position:relative;flex-grow:1;padding:0;margin:0;height:40px;}.playbackTimeline__progressBackground{width:100%;height:2px;background-color:#653338;}.playbackTimeline__progressBackground,.playbackTimeline__progressBar,.playbackTimeline__progressHandle{position:absolute;}.playbackTimeline__progressBar{width:0;height:2px;background-color:#ff6d65;}.playbackTimeline__progressHandle{border:1px solid #f50;border-radius:100%;height:8px;width:8px;background-color:#f50;box-sizing:border-box;margin-top:-4px;margin-left:-4px;opacity:0;transition:opacity .15s;}.playbackTimeline__duration,.playbackTimeline__progressWrapper,.playbackTimeline__snippetIndicator,.playbackTimeline__timePassed{line-height:auto;}.playbackTimeline__duration,.playbackTimeline__snippetIndicator,.playbackTimeline__timePassed{width:auto;line-height:20px;}.playbackTimeline__duration{position:absolute;padding:0;margin:0;font-size:10px;top:0;right:0;color:#8EC1C1;}.playbackTimeline__timePassed{position:absolute;padding:0;margin:0;font-size:10px;top:0;left:0;color:#8EC1C1;}.soundBadge__artwork
